com.xamoom.android.xamoomsdk.Storage

Class OfflineStorageTagModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xamoom.android.xamoomsdk.Storage.OfflineStorageTagModule

  • public class OfflineStorageTagModule
extends java.lang.Object
    OfflineStorageTagModule is used to download and delete spots marked with special tags. Use this if you want to download e.g. tours. This module will automatically save everything needed to show data when downloading spots with a custom tag. This module will automatically check if there are dependencies between entities and files.

    • Method Detail

      • downloadAndSaveWithTags

        public void downloadAndSaveWithTags(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags,
                                    boolean queueDownloads,
                                    APIListCallback<java.util.List<Spot>,java.util.List<at.rags.morpheus.Error>> callback,
                                    DownloadManager.OnDownloadManagerCompleted downloadCallback)
        Will download all spots with tag and their content and save entities and files.
        Parameters:
        tags - ArrayList of tags.
        queueDownloads - Queue downloads to load all at once. Use DownloadManager.downloadQueriedTasks() to start downloads.
        callback - Callback when finished saving to database.
        downloadCallback - Download callback for file downloads.

      • deleteWithTags

        public void deleteWithTags(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tags)
        Deletes all spots and connected content with tag, when there is no dependency to another tag.
        Parameters:
        tags - List of tags to delete.
